barFight.name: Bar Fight!!
barFight.description: You bumped into someone that was already having a bad day. A fight has spurred in the place!

nothing.name: Quiet... Too Quiet...
nothing.description: The bar is quiet... and... pretty empty?

stinkEye.name: Bad Side of Town
stinkEye.description: Everyone goes quiet when you enter and they turn and stare. They don't seem too happy to see your kind here

sleepingGoblins.name: Slumber Party
sleepingGoblins.description: There is a group of goblins sleeping and resting in this room. Did they hear you come in?

bandits.name: Old Fashion Mugging
bandits.description: A rag tag of hooligans spring from the trees, armed and dangerous. Whatever you have, they want it
